About.Name: Fassih Ahmad Khan
About.AboutText: I am a Software Engineer and Tier 2 Network Analyst with about 4 years of experience in IT infrastructure, troubleshooting, and scaling technical projects. Currently pursuing a B.S. in Information Systems at Seattle Pacific University, I’ve balanced academics with hands-on work, gaining hands-on expertise in scaling infrastructure, optimizing workflows, and mentoring teams to ensure seamless technical operations. I’m a problem-solver and innovative thinker who thrives in fast-paced environments, delivering reliable solutions that drive efficiency and performance.

Experience.EmploymentText:
• Delivered Tier 2 IT Support, specializing in computer infrastructure troubleshooting, hardware support, and maintenance across campus.
• Led and collaborated on technical projects, including:
1. Migrating clients from analog to VoIP phone systems.
2. Upgrading Wi-Fi hardware to modern standards for enhanced connectivity.

Project1.Title: FitFluencer
Project1.Desc:
The Fitfluencer app connects fitness enthusiasts with social media influencers, offering personalized workout plans, nutrition tips, and a supportive community. Users can track their progress, join live sessions, and engage with high-quality content. Influencers can monetize their expertise while inspiring and guiding their followers.
It has a GitHub repo and more details shown in screenshots.
